scripts.build:lambda: cd lambda && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lambda && npm run build
scripts.clean: find lib -name '*.js' -delete && find lib -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find lib -name '*.js.map' -delete && find bin -name '*.js' -delete && find bin -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find bin -name '*.js.map' -delete
scripts.clean:lambda: cd lambda && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:lambda && rm -rf node_modules cdk.out output
